endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of product categories available in the system to assist in inventory grouping.
Create a new demand forecast for a specific product based on historical sales data.
Retrieve the forecast data for a specific product using its ID.
Delete an existing demand forecast using its unique forecast ID.
List all active restocking alerts tailored to the inventory requirements.
Create new restocking alerts for identified product stock levels.
Modify the parameters of an existing restocking alert using the alert's ID.
Retrieve sales trend analysis data for the specified time period.
Upload additional sales or inventory data to enhance trend analysis.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific product, including sales and inventory attributes.
